scenario_text.value:
...Looks like everyone’s here. Guess that
means I’m the last one.

You’re late, Takuma!
You’re not usually bringing up the rear.

My bad, my bad. Preparations took longer than
I expected.

All right, let’s figure out our next course
of action.

Yes, about that.
Shuuji, would you do the honors?

First, I think we should prioritize contact
with the Sovereign Monster of the east.

The mountains and forest around there will
make searching for it difficult.

That’s why Aoi and I concluded that we should
get started while we have the extra time.
No objections here.
Still, there’s another problem.

Enemy movements are restricted thanks to the
Sovereign Monster of the north and west.

That means they’re probably concentrating
their forces in areas they CAN move in.

In other words...we have even tougher battles
waiting up ahead.

In that case, we should limit our search area
as much as we can.

(How are we supposed to do that?
If only there was some sort of clue...)
I bet I know who has an idea...
Professor.
Agumon.
Falcomon.

You’ve been to this world before, right,
Professor? Any ideas?

Sorry... This is fifty years ago you’re
talking about. I barely remember any of it.

The one in the east should be Qīnglóng (the
Azure Dragon), of the wood element.
The wood element...

Yes, there should be a Kemonogami in the land
surrounded by Qīnglóng’s forest.
I see...

It may not help limit our search range, but
I hope the knowledge offers some reassurance.
Yeah! Thanks a lot.
(You know who else might know something...)

Do you know any legends or anything, Agumon?
This world is your home after all.

Sorry, Takuma! I really don’t know anything
like that!
(I see... Who else might know something?)

Say, Falcomon, have you ever seen anything
from the sky?

My apologies... From above, I can’t ascertain
anything about the forest below.

(I guess we can’t see anything in the forest
unless we actually walk through it, huh?)

Guess we have no choice but to look for clues
in there ourselves...

East...east...
Maybe it’s that place...
Did you think of something, Renamon?

As you know, I’ve been on the run from the
Master this whole time.

Something I saw in my travels may be of some
use to you all.
You have some sort of idea?

There’s a place in the underground waterway
Piedmon and his cohorts regard as dangerous.
Dangerous? Why, exactly?

I’ve heard that many of their numbers have
vanished in that area.

A place where the Master’s Kemonogami
disappear... Wait, could that mean—?!

Yeah! The Sovereign Monster of the east might
be in there.

If that theory’s correct...we’ve gotta dive
into the belly of the beast.

You better believe the Master’s minions will
be there.

Still, we should go. We can’t let something
like that stop us.

Yeah! After everything we’ve been through,
heading straight at our enemies is nothing!

(Our course is set. It’s a bit scary, but
we’ve taken our first steps forward.)
